Unicron/Teufel:



A small shield a few feet wide extended from Unicron's r=
ight forearm, and he 
used it to block the weapons fire that was shot again=
st him.

/FOOLS/ was all he said as he fired three green optic blasts down =
at Hot Rod. 
 He raised his left hand, five rapid laser bolts seeming to fi=
re out of 
nowhere from his palm towards Magnus Prime (not sure if that's t=
he name, but 
the new version of Ultra Magnus).

---

Teufel looked at Zard=
us with a disgust programmed quite a bit into him for 
non-Brotherhood affi=
liated robots.  "Hoffe auf das beste und sei auf das 
schlimmste gefa=DFt!"=
 he avoided the missiles barely, knowing his relatively 
weak frame couldn'=
t take much damage.  The explosions from the missiles sent 
a light spray o=
f shrapnel into his back.

He let out a yell, and then a grow.  He raised b=
oth arms, firing twenty 
rounds from both shoulder-mounted cannons.  Forty =
rounds in all headed for 
Zardus' neck and chest.

A missile from each arm =
launched out at the Cybertronian Fire.
